items.sentence: What\'s the difference between this one and that one?
What\'s the fastest way to get the airport from here?
I found my father\'s diary that he kept for 30 years.
Tom was frightened and didn\'t want to be left alone.
Tom was pretty sure that Mary wouldn\'t catch a fish.
Tom knew that Mary wanted him to ask her to the prom.
Can you give me some idea what time you\'ll get here?
Tom said he\'d been spending a lot of time with Mary.
Tom sang better today than I\'ve ever heard him sing.
I\'ll give you five minutes to work out this problem.
I\'ll never forget what happened on October 20, 2013.
I\'m in the middle of something. Can I call you back?
Unfortunately, I only understood half of what I read.
I hate to interrupt you, but I need to say something.
I have three friends that often drop by on Saturdays.
I just want to sit on the beach and relax for a week.
I wish I had studied French harder while I was young.
I thought Tom would be able to swim better than that.
I thought Tom would go to the bank and get some cash.
I thought about giving my saxophone to Tom as a gift.
